Title: Relates to implementing automatic enrollment for the tax abatement program for rent-controlled and rent-regulated property occupied by senior citizens
Summary: Implements automatic enrollment for the tax abatement program for rent-controlled and rent-regulated property occupied by senior citizens; provides for a check box for a taxpayer to opt-out of data sharing and automatic enrollment on their tax return.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the real property tax law, in relation to implementing automatic enrollment for the tax abatement program for rent-controlled and rent-regulated property occupied by senior citizens
